00040 template<

00197     size_t addString(STRING_TYPE* pStr, uint64_t addr)
00198     {
00199       //STRING_TYPE tmp;
00200       //pStr->subString(tmp,1);
00201       *pStr = SelfType::substr(*pStr , 1);
00202       
00203       _string_ptr_ p(pStr, addr);
00204       str_ptr_it it = lower_bound(strPtrs_.begin(), strPtrs_.end(), p);
00205       if (it!=strPtrs_.end() && (*it)==p)
00206         return strPtrs_.size();
00207       
00208       strPtrs_.insert(it, p);
00209       return strPtrs_.size();
00210     }

00217   struct _bucket_
00218   {
00219     charT from_;
00220     charT to_;
00221     uint32_t count_;
00222     uint32_t size_;
00223     bool dirty_;
00224     vector<_string_group_> strGroup_;
00225     uint64_t diskPos_;
00226 
00227     inline _bucket_(charT from, charT to)
00228     {
00229       /*
00230         if(from>to)
00231         throw exception;
00232       */
00233       from_ = from;
00234       to_ = to;
00235       count_ = 0;
00236       size_ = INITIAL_BUCKET_SIZE;//byte
00237       dirty_ = true;
00238       diskPos_ = -1;
00239     }
00240 
00241     void setUstring(STRING_TYPE& ustr, const charT* p, size_t len)
00242     {
00243       for (size_t i=0; i<len; i++)
00244         ustr += p[i];
00245     }
00246 
00247     inline _bucket_(struct _disk_bucket_* disk, uint64_t addr )
00248     {
00249       from_ = disk->from_;
00250       to_ = disk->to_;
00251       count_ = disk->count_;
00252       diskPos_ = addr;
00253       dirty_ = false;
00254       size_ = disk->size_;
00255 
00256       //cout<<count_<<" "<<size_<<" "<<from_<<" "<<to_<<"  "<<addr<<endl;
00257       
00258       uint32_t t=0;
00259       charT first = -1;
00260       for (uint32_t i =0; i<count_; i++)
00261       {
00262         uint32_t strSize = *(uint32_t*)(disk->strBuf+t);//ustring's length
00263         t += sizeof (uint32_t);
00264         if (t > DISK_STR_BUF_SIZE || strSize > DISK_STR_BUF_SIZE)
00265         {
00266           //THROW exception
00267           //LDBG_<<"\nError:  _bucket_(struct _disk_bucket_* disk, uint64_t addr ) 1:"<<debug_count;
00268           LDBG_<<"\nError:  _bucket_(struct _disk_bucket_* disk, uint64_t addr ) 1:";
00269           return;
00270         }
00271         
00272         charT firstCh = *(charT*)(disk->strBuf+t);
00273         t += sizeof (charT);//strSize;
00274         
00275         STRING_TYPE* s = new  STRING_TYPE();
00276         setUstring(*s, (const charT*)(disk->strBuf+t), strSize);
00277 //         s->displayStringValue(ENCODE_TYPE, cout);
00278 //         cout<<endl;
00279         
00280         t += s->size();
00281         
00282         if (t > DISK_STR_BUF_SIZE)
00283         {
00284           //THROW exception
00285           LDBG_<<"\nError:  _bucket_(struct _disk_bucket_* disk, uint64_t addr ) 2:"<<strSize<<"\n";
00286           return;
00287         }
00288                 
00289         uint64_t cont = *(uint64_t*)(disk->strBuf+t);
00290         t += sizeof(uint64_t);
00291         if (t > DISK_STR_BUF_SIZE)
00292         {
00293           //THROW exception
00294           LDBG_<<"\nError:  _bucket_(struct _disk_bucket_* disk, uint64_t addr ) 3:\n";
00295           return;
00296         }
00297 
00298         
00299         if (first!=firstCh)
00300         {
00301           _string_group_ sg;
00302           sg.firstChar_ = firstCh;
00303           sg.strPtrs_.push_back(_string_ptr_(s, cont));
00304           first = firstCh;
00305           strGroup_.push_back(sg);
00306         }
00307         else
00308         {
00309           strGroup_.back().strPtrs_.push_back(_string_ptr_(s, cont));
00310         }
00311 
00312         
00313       }
00314       
00315     }
00316     
00317   }
00318     ;

00333   ~Bucket()
00334   {
00335     for (str_group_it i=pBucket_->strGroup_.begin(); i!=pBucket_->strGroup_.end();i++)
00336     {
00337       for (str_ptr_it j=(*i).strPtrs_.begin(); j!=(*i).strPtrs_.end();j++)
00338         if ((*j).p_!=NULL)
00339         {
00340           delete (*j).p_;
00341           (*j).p_ = NULL;
00342         }
00343       
00344     }
00345     delete pBucket_;
00346     pBucket_ = NULL;
00347   }

00352   bool isEmpty()
00353   {
00354     if (pBucket_==NULL)
00355       return true;
00356 
00357     if (pBucket_->strGroup_.size()==0)
00358       return true;
00359 
00360     return false;
00361   }

00366   bool load(uint64_t addr)
00367   {
00368     //cout<<"bucket loading!\n";
00369     struct _disk_bucket_ b;
00370     
00371     fseek(f_, addr, SEEK_SET);
00372     if(fread(&b, sizeof(struct _disk_bucket_),1,f_)!=1)
00373       return false;
00374 
00375     if (!isEmpty())
00376     {
00377       update2disk();
00378       for (str_group_it i=pBucket_->strGroup_.begin(); i!=pBucket_->strGroup_.end();i++)
00379       {
00380         for (str_ptr_it j=(*i).strPtrs_.begin(); j!=(*i).strPtrs_.end();j++)
00381           if ((*j).p_!=NULL)
00382           {
00383             delete (*j).p_;
00384             (*j).p_ = NULL;
00385           }
00386         
00387       }
00388       
00389       delete pBucket_;
00390       pBucket_ = NULL;
00391     }
00392 
00393     if (pBucket_!=NULL)
00394       delete pBucket_;
00395     
00396     pBucket_ = new struct _bucket_(&b, addr);
00397 
00398 //     if (getStrCount() != pBucket_->count_)
00399 //       LDBG_<<"Bucket load()**********\n**********\n*************\n************\n*******************Bucket()\n";
00400 
00401 //     if (pBucket_->size_ != getBucketSize())
00402 //       LDBG_<<pBucket_->diskPos_<<getBucketSize()<<pBucket_->size_<<pBucket_->count_<<"Bucket load(): bucket size error!"<<debug_count;
00403 
00404     return true;
00405     
00406   }

00411   uint32_t getBucketSize()
00412   {
00413     uint32_t s = INITIAL_BUCKET_SIZE;
00414     
00415     for (str_group_it i=pBucket_->strGroup_.begin(); i!=pBucket_->strGroup_.end();i++)
00416     {
00417       for (str_ptr_it j=(*i).strPtrs_.begin();j!=(*i).strPtrs_.end(); j++)
00418       {
00419         s += ONE_STRING_SIZE(*((*j).p_));
00420       }
00421     }
00422 
00423     return s;
00424     
00425   }

00430   uint32_t bucket2disk(struct _bucket_* b, struct _disk_bucket_* d)
00431   {
00432     d->from_ = b->from_;
00433     d->to_ = b->to_;
00434     d->count_ = b->count_;
00435     d->size_ = b->size_;
00436     
00437     uint32_t t=0;
00438     
00439     for (str_group_it i=b->strGroup_.begin(); i!=b->strGroup_.end();i++)
00440     {
00441       for (str_ptr_it j=(*i).strPtrs_.begin();j!=(*i).strPtrs_.end(); j++)
00442       {
00443 //         string tmp;
00444 //         (*j).p_->convertString(tmp, ENCODE_TYPE);
00445 
00446         *(uint32_t*)(d->strBuf+t) = (*j).p_->length();// + sizeof(UCS2Char);
00447         
00448         t += sizeof(uint32_t);
00449         if (t > DISK_STR_BUF_SIZE)
00450         {
00451           LDBG_<<"bucket2disk(struct _bucket_* b, struct _disk_bucket_* d): 1";
00452           return (uint32_t)-1;
00453         }
00454         
00455         *(charT*)(d->strBuf+t) = (*i).firstChar_;
00456         t += sizeof(charT);
00457         //(*j).p_->copy(d->strBuf+t,  (*j).p_->length());
00458 
00459         memcpy(d->strBuf+t, (*j).p_->c_str(),  (*j).p_->size());
00460         
00461         t += (*j).p_->size();
00462         if (t > DISK_STR_BUF_SIZE)
00463         {
00464           LDBG_<<"bucket2disk(struct _bucket_* b, struct _disk_bucket_* d): 2->"<< (*j).p_->size();
00465           return (uint32_t)-1;
00466         }
00467         *(uint64_t*)(d->strBuf+t) = (*j).contentAddr_;
00468         t += sizeof(uint64_t);
00469       }
00470     }
00471 
00472     return t;
00473   }
00474 
00478   uint64_t update2disk()
00479   {
00480     //cout<<"update2disk()\n";
00481     
00482     if (pBucket_==NULL)
00483       return false;
00484     
00485     
00486     if (pBucket_->dirty_)
00487     {
00488       //cout<<"update2disk\n";
00489       pBucket_->dirty_ = false;
00490       if (pBucket_->diskPos_ == (uint64_t)-1)
00491       {
00492         //cout<<"add2disk\n";
00493         return add2disk();
00494       }
00495 
00496       struct _disk_bucket_ b;
00497       fseek(f_, pBucket_->diskPos_, SEEK_SET);
00498       bucket2disk(pBucket_, &b);
00499       if(fwrite(&b, sizeof(struct _disk_bucket_), 1, f_)!=1)
00500       {
00501         return (uint64_t)-1;
00502       }
00503       return pBucket_->diskPos_;
00504       
00505     }
00506 
00507 //     if (getStrCount() != pBucket_->count_)
00508 //       LDBG_<<"Bucket update()**********\n**********\n*************\n************\n*******************Bucket()\n";
00509 
00510     
00511 //     if (pBucket_->size_ != getBucketSize())
00512 //       LDBG_<<pBucket_->diskPos_<<getBucketSize()<<pBucket_->size_<<pBucket_->count_<<"Bucket update(): bucket size error!"<<debug_count;
00513 
00514     return true;
00515   }
00516 
00520   uint64_t add2disk()
00521   {
00522     if (pBucket_==NULL)
00523       return (uint64_t)-1;
00524     
00525     fseek(f_, 0, SEEK_END);
00526     uint64_t end = ftell(f_);
00527     
00528     if (end%2==1)
00529     {//bucket only be stored at even address, which distinguish from alphabet node
00530       fseek(f_, 1, SEEK_END);
00531       end++;
00532     }
00533     
00534     pBucket_->diskPos_ = end;
00535     struct _disk_bucket_ b;
00536     bucket2disk(pBucket_, &b);
00537     if (fwrite( &b, sizeof(struct _disk_bucket_), 1, f_)!=1)
00538       return (uint64_t) -1;
00539 
00540 //     if (getStrCount() != pBucket_->count_)
00541 //       LDBG_<<"Bucket add2disk()**********\n**********\n*************\n************\n*******************Bucket()\n";
00542 
00543     
00544 //     if (pBucket_->size_ != getBucketSize())
00545 //       LDBG_<<pBucket_->diskPos_<<getBucketSize()<<pBucket_->size_<<pBucket_->count_<<"Bucket add2disk(): bucket size error!"<<debug_count;
00546 
00547     pBucket_->dirty_ = false;
00548     
00549     return end;
00550   }

00555   bool updateContent(const STRING_TYPE& str, uint64_t contentAddr)
00556   {
00557     str_group_it g = lower_bound(pBucket_->strGroup_.begin(), pBucket_->strGroup_.end(), str);
00558     if (g != pBucket_->strGroup_.end() && *g==str)
00559     {
00560       STRING_TYPE s = substr(str ,1);
00561       //str.subString(s, 1);
00562       str_ptr_it p = lower_bound((*g).strPtrs_.begin(), (*g).strPtrs_.end(), &s);
00563       if (p !=  (*g).strPtrs_.end() && (*p)==&s )
00564       {
00565          (*p).contentAddr_ = contentAddr;
00566          return true;
00567       }
00568       
00569     }
00570     return false;
00571   }
00572 
00576   uint64_t getContentBy(const STRING_TYPE& str)const
00577   {
00578     str_group_it g = lower_bound(pBucket_->strGroup_.begin(), pBucket_->strGroup_.end(), str);
00579     if (g != pBucket_->strGroup_.end() && *g==str)
00580     {
00581       STRING_TYPE s = substr(str ,1);
00582       //UString s;
00583       //str.subString(s, 1);
00584       str_ptr_it p = lower_bound((*g).strPtrs_.begin(), (*g).strPtrs_.end(), &s);
00585       if (p !=  (*g).strPtrs_.end() && (*p)==&s )
00586         return (*p).contentAddr_;
00587     }
00588     
00589     return (uint64_t)-1;
00590   }
00591 
00598   void findRegExp(const STRING_TYPE& regexp, const STRING_TYPE& sofar, vector<item_pair<STRING_TYPE> >& ret)
00599   {
00600     if (regexp.length()==0)
00601       return ;
00602     
00603     if (regexp[0]!='*' && regexp[0]!='?')
00604     {
00605       str_group_it g = lower_bound(pBucket_->strGroup_.begin(), pBucket_->strGroup_.end(), regexp);
00606       if (g != pBucket_->strGroup_.end() && *g==regexp)
00607       {
00608         STRING_TYPE s = substr(regexp ,1);
00609         //regexp.subString(s, 1);
00610         Automation<STRING_TYPE> aut(s);
00611         if (!aut.hasWildcard())
00612         {
00613           str_ptr_it p = lower_bound((*g).strPtrs_.begin(), (*g).strPtrs_.end(), &s);
00614           if (p !=  (*g).strPtrs_.end() && (*p)==&s )
00615           {
00616             s = sofar;
00617             s += regexp;
00618             ret.push_back(item_pair<STRING_TYPE>(s, (*p).contentAddr_));
00619             //ret.push_back((*p).contentAddr_);
00620             return;
00621           }
00622           return;
00623         }
00624         
00625         for (str_ptr_it j=(*g).strPtrs_.begin(); j!=(*g).strPtrs_.end();j++)
00626         {
00627           if (aut.match(*(*j).p_))
00628           {
00629             STRING_TYPE tmp = sofar;
00630             tmp +=  (*(*j).p_);
00631             ret.push_back(item_pair<STRING_TYPE>(tmp, (*j).contentAddr_));
00632             //ret.push_back((*j).contentAddr_);
00633           }
00634         }
00635 
00636         return;
00637       }
00638     }
00639 
00640     STRING_TYPE s = regexp;
00641     if (regexp[0]=='?')
00642     {
00643       s = substr(regexp,1);
00644       //regexp.subString(s, 1);
00645     }
00646     
00647 
00648     Automation<STRING_TYPE> aut(s);
00649     for (str_group_it i=pBucket_->strGroup_.begin(); i!=pBucket_->strGroup_.end();i++)
00650     {
00651       for (str_ptr_it j=(*i).strPtrs_.begin(); j!=(*i).strPtrs_.end();j++)
00652       {  
00653           if (aut.match(*(*j).p_))
00654           {
00655             STRING_TYPE tmp = sofar;
00656             tmp +=  (*(*j).p_);
00657             ret.push_back(item_pair<STRING_TYPE>(tmp, (*j).contentAddr_));
00658             //ret.push_back((*j).contentAddr_);
00659           }
00660       }
00661     }
00662 
00663   }

00666 friend ostream& operator << ( ostream& os, const SelfType& node)
00667   {
00668     cout<<endl;
00669     cout<<"-----------------------------\n";
00670     cout<<"Range: "<<node.pBucket_->from_<<"--"<<node.pBucket_->to_<<endl;
00671     cout<<"Count: "<<node.pBucket_->count_<<"  Size: "<<node.pBucket_->size_<<endl;
00672     cout<<"Dirty: "<<node.pBucket_->dirty_<<"  Disk Pos: "<<node.pBucket_->diskPos_<<endl;
00673     
00674     for (str_group_it i=node.pBucket_->strGroup_.begin(); i!=node.pBucket_->strGroup_.end();i++)
00675     {
00676       cout<<"@"<<(*i).firstChar_<<" ........."<<endl;
00677       for (str_ptr_it j=(*i).strPtrs_.begin(); j!=(*i).strPtrs_.end();j++)
00678       {
00679         //(*(*j).p_).displayStringValue(ENCODE_TYPE, os);
00680         os<<" =>"<<(*j).contentAddr_<<endl;
00681       }
00682     }
00683 
00684     return os;
00685   }

00691 
00695   uint32_t addString(STRING_TYPE* pStr, uint64_t addr)
00696   {
00697     //if (!canAddString(str))
00698     //return pBucket_->size_;
00699     
00700     if (pStr->length()<=1)
00701       return pBucket_->size_;
00702 
00703     if ((*pStr)[0]<pBucket_->from_ || (*pStr)[0]>pBucket_->to_)
00704       return pBucket_->size_;
00705 
00706 //     if (getStrCount() != pBucket_->count_)
00707 //     LDBG_<<"before addstring(): string count in bucket error!";
00708 
00709 //     if (pBucket_->size_ != getBucketSize())
00710 //       LDBG_<<"before addstring(): bucket size error!"<<debug_count;
00711     
00712     str_group_it t = lower_bound(pBucket_->strGroup_.begin(), pBucket_->strGroup_.end(), (*pStr));
00713     
00714     if (t!=pBucket_->strGroup_.end() && (*t)==(*pStr))
00715     {    
00716       //has group
00717       //LDBG_<<"group exist!";
00718       
00719         size_t s = (*t).strPtrs_.size();
00720         if(s<(*t).addString(pStr, addr))
00721         {
00722           pBucket_->count_++;
00723           pBucket_->size_ += ONE_STRING_SIZE(*pStr);
00724         }
00725         
00726     }
00727     else
00728     {// no group at all
00729       //LDBG_<<"group inexist!";
00730       _string_group_ g;
00731       g.firstChar_ = (*pStr)[0];
00732       
00733       g.addString(pStr, addr);
00734       
00735       pBucket_->count_++;
00736       pBucket_->size_ += ONE_STRING_SIZE(*pStr);
00737       pBucket_->strGroup_.insert(t,g);
00738     }
00739 
00740     pBucket_->dirty_ = true;
00741 
00742     
00743 //     if (getStrCount() != pBucket_->count_)
00744 //      LDBG_<<"after addstring(): string count in bucket error!";
00745 
00746 //     if (pBucket_->size_ != getBucketSize())
00747 //       LDBG_<<"after addstring(): bucket size error!";
00748     
00749     return pBucket_->size_;
00750   }
00751 
00755   bool isFull()const
00756   {
00757     if (pBucket_->size_ >= BUCKET_SIZE)
00758       return true;
00759     
00760     return false;
00761     
00762   }
00763 
00767   bool canAddString(const STRING_TYPE& str)
00768   {
00769     return length()+ONE_STRING_SIZE(str)<=BUCKET_SIZE;
00770   }
00771 
00775   uint32_t length()const
00776   {
00777     return pBucket_->size_;
00778   }
00779 
00783   uint32_t getStrCount()
00784   {
00785     uint32_t c = 0;
00786 
00787     for (str_group_it i=pBucket_->strGroup_.begin();i!=pBucket_->strGroup_.end();i++)
00788       c += (*i).strPtrs_.size();
00789 
00790     return c;
00791   }
00792 
00796   charT split(Bucket* newBucket, vector<STRING_TYPE>& leftStr, vector<uint64_t>& leftAddr)
00797   {
00798 //     leftStr.clear();
00799 //     if (getStrCount() != pBucket_->count_)
00800 //       LDBG_<<"before split()**********\n**********\n*************\n************\n*******************before split()\n";
00801 
00802 //     if (pBucket_->size_ != getBucketSize())
00803 //       LDBG_<<"before split(): bucket size error!";
00804     
00805     if (isPure())
00806     {
00807       struct _bucket_* t = pBucket_;
00808       pBucket_ = new struct _bucket_(ALPHABET[0], ALPHABET[ALPHABET_SIZE-1]);
00809       
00810       for (str_group_it i=t->strGroup_.begin(); i!=t->strGroup_.end();i++)
00811       {
00812         for (str_ptr_it j=(*i).strPtrs_.begin(); j!=(*i).strPtrs_.end();j++)
00813         {
00814           if (((*j).p_)->length()<=1)
00815           {
00816             STRING_TYPE s;
00817             s += (*i).firstChar_;
00818             s += (*(*j).p_);
00819             leftStr.push_back(s);
00820             leftAddr.push_back((*j).contentAddr_);
00821             continue;
00822           }
00823           
00824           
00825           addString(((*j).p_),(*j).contentAddr_ );
00826           //delete (*j).p_;
00827         }
00828       }
00829 
00830       pBucket_->diskPos_ = t->diskPos_;
00831       pBucket_->dirty_ = true;
00832       
00833       delete t;
00834       
00835     }
00836 
00837     if (pBucket_->strGroup_.size()==1)
00838     {
00839       //throw exception
00840       //cout<<"\n-------------------Split error!--------------------";
00841       return (charT)-1;
00842     }
00843     
00844     uint32_t left = (uint32_t)(pBucket_->count_/100.00*SPLIT_RATIO);
00845     //
00846     uint32_t c = 0;
00847     
00848     str_group_it i=pBucket_->strGroup_.begin();
00849     
00850     for (size_t j=1; i!=pBucket_->strGroup_.end();i++,j++)
00851     {
00852       //cout<<(*i).strPtrs_.size()<<endl;
00853       
00854       if (c>=left || j==pBucket_->strGroup_.size())
00855       {
00856         //found the spliting point
00857         pBucket_->count_ -= (*i).strPtrs_.size();
00858         pBucket_->size_ -= newBucket->addStrGroup(*i);
00859         
00860         i = pBucket_->strGroup_.erase(i);
00861         i--;
00862         j--;
00863       }
00864       c += (*i).strPtrs_.size();
00865     }
00866 
00867     newBucket->setUpBound(ALPHABET[getIndexOf(pBucket_->strGroup_.back().firstChar_)+1]);
00868     newBucket->setLowBound(pBucket_->to_);
00869     pBucket_->to_ = (pBucket_->strGroup_.back()).firstChar_;
00870 
00871     pBucket_->dirty_ = true;
00872 
00873 //     if (getStrCount() != pBucket_->count_)
00874 //       LDBG_<<"split()**********\n**********\n*************\n************\n*******************split()\n";
00875 //     if (pBucket_->size_ != getBucketSize())
00876 //       LDBG_<<"split(): bucket size error!";
00877      
00878     return pBucket_->to_;
00879   }
00880 
00884   static uint32_t getIndexOf(charT ch)
00885   {
00886     if (ch<ALPHABET[0] || ch>ALPHABET[ALPHABET_SIZE-1])
00887     {
00888       LDBG_<<"Can't find '"<<ch<<"' in alphabet";
00889       return -1;
00890     }
00891     
00892     if(ALPHABET[0] == 'a' && ALPHABET[ALPHABET_SIZE-1]=='z')
00893     {
00894       if (ch <= 'Z' && ch >='A')
00895         return ch-'A';
00896       return ch-ALPHABET[0];
00897     }
00898 
00899     uint32_t start = 0;
00900     uint32_t end  = ALPHABET_SIZE -1;
00901     uint32_t mid = (start + end)/2;
00902     
00903     while ( mid<=end && mid>=start)
00904     {
00905       if (ALPHABET[mid]==ch)
00906         return mid;
00907       
00908       if (ALPHABET[mid]<ch)
00909       {
00910         start = mid+1;
00911         mid = (start + end)/2;
00912         continue;
00913       }
00914 
00915       if (ALPHABET[mid]>ch)
00916       {
00917         end = mid-1;
00918         mid = (start + end)/2;
00919         continue;
00920       }
00921     }
00922 
00923     return -1;
00924   }
00925 
00929   bool isPure() const
00930   {
00931     return (pBucket_->to_ -pBucket_->from_)==0;
00932   }
00933 
00937   charT getUpBound()const
00938   {
00939     return pBucket_->from_;
00940   }
00941 
00945   size_t getStrGroupAmount()const
00946   {
00947     return pBucket_->strGroup_.size();
00948   }
00949 
00953   uint64_t getDiskAddr()const
00954   {
00955     return pBucket_->diskPos_;
00956   }
00957 
00961   charT getGroupChar(size_t idx)
00962   {
00963     if (idx>=getStrGroupAmount())
00964       return (charT)-1;
00965 
00966     return pBucket_->strGroup_[idx].firstChar_;
00967     
00968   }
00969 
00973   charT getLowBound() const
00974   {
00975     return pBucket_->to_;
00976   }
00977 
00981   uint32_t addStrGroup(const _string_group_& g)
00982   {
00983     uint32_t size = 0;
00984     for (const_str_ptr_it j=g.strPtrs_.begin(); j!=g.strPtrs_.end();j++)
00985     {
00986       //cout<<*((*j).p_)<<endl;
00987       size += ONE_STRING_SIZE(*((*j).p_));
00988       pBucket_->count_++;
00989     }
00990     
00991 
00992     pBucket_->strGroup_.push_back(g);
00993     pBucket_->size_ += size;
00994     pBucket_->dirty_ = true;
00995 
00996     return size;
00997   }
00998 
01002   void setUpBound(charT ch)
01003   {
01004     if (pBucket_->from_!=ch)
01005       pBucket_->dirty_ = true;
01006     
01007     pBucket_->from_ = ch;
01008   }
01009 
01013   void setLowBound(charT ch)
01014   {
01015     if (pBucket_->to_!=ch)
01016       pBucket_->dirty_ = true;
01017     
01018     pBucket_->to_ = ch;
01019     
01020   }
01021

01023 protected:
01024   FILE* f_; 
01025   struct _bucket_* pBucket_;
01026   
01027   
01028 }
